title: I can't open the client.
body: As soon as I attempt to open the client it immediately closes and pops up a bugsplat window. After that it retries to open it again automatically and it fails, filling up my entire screen with bugsplat windows. Sad to say restarting my computer wont help and I also attempted to reinstall League of Legends but that didn't fix it either.

replies.body:
Wow that's a lot of bugs!  A reinstall can help, but your issue could also be caused by overzealous security settings causing installation or access problems.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide just to make sure league has proper access.

Then run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure this isn't being caused by other factors like driver issues.  I hope that helps!
I already mentioned that reinstalling didn't fix the problem however I tried to run as Administrator and it worked perfectly, thank you.

Running As Administrator is not a guarantee, just the easiest method to attempt a temporary workaround.  You'll want to run through those guides to rule out possibilities.  To clarify, the issue is likely to occur again.  Best of luck!
Worked of me. SUPer thank you mate. I'll spread this to another person too. TY RIOT!
